subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 31 points and set the team record for steals and Cleveland moved to 12-0 at home with a 114-94 victory over the Toronto Raptors.
snippet: LeBron James scored 31 points and set the team record for steals and Cleveland moved to 12-0 at home with a 114-94 victory over the Toronto Raptors.
